title: pretty suboptimal admin settings ui
body:
with external storage enabled, i experienced the following behaviour:

under admin > external storage

#### experience 1
1. enter folder name `mounttest`
2. select `local`

result: a new row gets added and the "select storage" dropdown is selected.
better: the configuration text field should be selected and allow me to finish my first mount definition.

#### experience 2
1. enter folder name `mounttest`
2. select `local`
3. type in `/tmp/my/super/ocstore/` in the `configuration` text box.
4. forget to select `applicable` and assume the settings have been stored since there is no save button.
5. click `files`

result: everything that has been entered has been lost and has to be reentered
expected: there needs to be an indicator that the row is incomplete

#### experience 3
1. try to rename `mounttest` to `mounttest2`
2. click `files` fast enough

result: the rename is not done.
expected: there needs to be an indicator that something has yet to be saved. and probably even a progress indicator.

#### experience 4
the "maximum input size for zip files" setting has a save button while the external storage settings do not. this is pretty confusing and inconsistent.

also see #4559 and #4557.

this is against master (02b2b5a808b135007d8d54b837e70c38f02729fd)
